metadata.title: CVE-2018-20103 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in dns.c in HAProxy through 1.8.14. In the case ofa compressed pointer, a crafted packet can trigger infinite recursion bymaking the pointer point to itself, or create a long chain of validpointers resulting in stack exhaustion.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-20103` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

haproxy - 1.8.8-1ubuntu0.3
vim-haproxy - 1.8.8-1ubuntu0.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: haproxy package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.8.8-1ubuntu0.3').
